Object Shape: Circle, Disc, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Other, Unknown
Summary: Many lights, some in formation others throughout the atmosphere over a period of almost 4 weeks
divs: Sighting DetailsMy first siting was in Wildwood NJ, during bike week. it was around 11:00 pm we took a walk on the beach. I wanted to walk in the water one last time before fall. I love to watch the stars it is something i do on a regular basis. I did not have direct contact with this ship. I only watch it and have watched more since. I watched this craft for about 25 mins. I didnt want to take my eyes off of it. I thought i would never witness something so incredible. I watched this ship light up the sky as if if were showing a search light. i watch a planes go straight across the sky while this thing hovered afer the plane passed it it took off with a speed like i havent seen and caught up with the plane went with it for a few seconds then like a stone on water skipped back to it original position. About 5 days later i noticed the same bright light but a few hours earlier in the day. In my mind i thought myself am I crazy, however with mine own eyes I saw just what I saw and im not the only one. these last few weeks there have been many lights many formations in my night sky. I have seen orange balls of light starlike lights, bright lights , lights that move together I want answers!I waited two weeks before I even mentioned this to my closest of friends, I didnt think I would ever witness such a thing. i thought it happepened and that is just that, it happened. these things have been in my night sky for weeks not nights not one two nights but weeks! I urge you to please come video something i cannot. I do not have the equipment to tape to measure only my memory which this has imprinted. I cannot dismiss what i see with my two eyes cannot explain and i am told I am crazy for thinking outside our capabilities. please contact me 1(856) 462- 4090 OR 1(856) 765-7685
